keyMoments.title: Satori's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Satori appears before Luffy, Sanji, and Usopp in the Ordeal of Balls area, introducing himself with his characteristic 'Ho ho hoo!' laugh.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces one of the four priests of Enel's God's Army and the first character to demonstrate Mantra (Observation Haki) in the series.
keyMoments.quote: Ho ho hoo! Welcome to the Ordeal of Balls!

keyMoments.title: Mantra Demonstration
keyMoments.description: Satori demonstrates his Mantra ability by predicting and effortlessly dodging all of Luffy and Sanji's attacks.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of Observation Haki in the One Piece series, introducing a fundamental power system.
keyMoments.quote: With Mantra, I can predict your every move before you make it!

keyMoments.title: Impact Dial Usage
keyMoments.description: Satori uses Impact Dials hidden beneath his gloves to absorb and release attack force as devastating counterattacks.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the combat application of dial technology and shows a technique that can harm even Luffy.

keyMoments.title: Overwhelming the Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: Satori completely dominates Luffy, Sanji, and Usopp using his combination of Mantra, Impact Dials, and Surprise Clouds.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Satori as a formidable opponent and demonstrates the threat level of Enel's priests.

abilities.description: Observation Haki that allows Satori to predict what his opponent will do before they attack by reading their mind and intentions.
Dials worn beneath gloves that absorb the force of opponents' attacks and release them as powerful internal shockwaves.
Large spherical clouds containing various items from harmless to deadly, creating an unpredictable battlefield.

reveals.information: Priest in charge of the Ordeal of Balls with a 10% survival rate
Possesses Mantra (Observation Haki) to predict opponents' moves
Playful and childlike demeanor with characteristic 'Ho ho hoo!' laugh
